scripts.build: tsc && (pnpm run test:json || true) && node generate-test-results.js
scripts.rebuild: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
scripts.test:json: jest src/player-generator/playerGenerator_tests.ts src/event-bus/eventBus_tests.ts src/name-generator/name_generator_test.ts src/uuid/uuid_tests.ts src/state-manager/state_manager_tests.ts src/toast-manager/toast_manager_tests.ts src/match-simulator/matchSimulator_tests.ts src/timeline/timeline_test.ts --json --outputFile=dist/test-results.json
scripts.install: pnpm run lint && pnpm run rebuild && pnpm run test
scripts.dev: pnpm run build && cd dist && python3 -m http.server 8000
